content.detailedDescription:
My mother and her sister were driving home from their parent's house in two  separate vehicles.  my mother saw one fireball darting back and forth across the highway, her sister called and asked if she was seeing it...Then there were three fireballs darting back and forth across the sky.  they were amazed, which us difficult because they had been raised in the us air force.  out of the many bases they had lived on and the many planes they had been witness to flying overhead, this was different, although not the first time they had seen fireballs in the sky.
the fireballs were moving super fast, darting back and forth overhead.  they would change direction without hesitation or deceleration.  
the finally shot out of sight.
content.summary: Very strange, but not the first fireball that has been witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: We was sitting outside w.Kidsy husband looked up said look.At that..I looked up saw this strange yellow orange orb grabbed my phone and recorded it til it went into the trees my husband followed the orb and it disappeared in the night sky...
content.summary: Just.Seen it come out of the sky and witnessed it called cross the sky i got a video of it then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out on our back deck watching fireworks, when he noticed a light.  i was video tapping the fireworks and put my ipad toward where he told me.  in the video you can see the fireworks, but keep your eye to the right lower corner.  it was really strange, i have a few videos from that night and the ufo was in most of them.  it just appears and disappears.  there were no faa lights.  my husband is the biggest sceptic, but he was amazed.  we saw one  light.
content.summary: 4th of july ufo

content.detailedDescription: Watching the fourth of july fireworks and noticed the orbs, there were three of them two close together and one back farther and slightly lower.  it as about a minute after the fireworks started and my husband and mother noticed too and then the people watching around us. its very loud because were where very close to where they were setting off the fireworks. i took a few photos on high speed burst and then switched to video. there had to have been 5 hundred people watching the fireworks that night.
content.summary: 3 red orange orbs appear a minute after fireworks start on july fourth 2014 in st.Regis falls ny. very bright and many witnesses.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Orange object came across the lake, then turned and went a mile and off into the clouds.    3 of us were in a boat at night, and we heard the neighbors around their fire say what is the flame in the sky.     never seen anything like it, truly amazing visual.     wasn't someone's toy drone, if it was it took off into the clouds to never return.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flying object, never seen before by. many witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, daughter and i observed this object on our way home from vacation, traveling ne.  while driving along route 191, i looked out the passenger window and happened to notice a translucent sphere hovering over someone's backyard.  inside this sphere was what appeared to be an orange-yellow flame.  i made a right turn down the road where the object was to get a closer look at it.  i asked my husband and daughter for their opinion, because i couldn't say what it was.  at first i thought a balloon with a candle in it that someone had tied and flown in the air.  but when we got closer, no cord was visible.  my husband and daughter were also stumped as to what the object could be.  after a minute or two, we observed the object to slowly start moving north, gaining speed and disappearing altogether.  it was not visible after about 30 seconds.
content.summary: Translucent sphere with flame inside, hovering stationary over someone's backyard.

content.detailedDescription: We were roasting mashmellows and looking up in the sky and that when my friend saw a flashing light in the sky. at first we thought it was plane. then it came down into the mountain then back up into the skin. it disappeared behind the my.
content.summary: Flashing light, moved up and down and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
It was on july 5th 2014 , outside while watching fireworks in laurel maryland. the fire works were done by a lake in one direction. i happen to look up and behind me and seen an object with 7 circles 6 going around and one in the middle in the shape of a flower .It moved backwards and forward slowly then eventually the lights went out and you would see a purple or blue light resemble an airplane light . then maybe about 15 seconds later you would see all 7 of the lights .  
later after turning back around seen it again just staying in one place and then it moved away.
my first thought was that it was an ufo . i was just concerned as to what that was in the hair and why would it be moving back and fourth and over top of our heads.. it moved away i kept my eyes on it for a long time then it just disappeared in the air
content.summary: Watching fire works in one direction by the lake and then behind us seen this object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: last night about 9:40 pm i was taking a break and having a cigarette while working at a local convenience store. i spotted a ball of orange light in the southwest part of the sky. i assumed it was a plane until i had watched for about half a minute. i began to suspect it wasn't a plane when i could not discern any blinking red or green lights. i watched as it traveled in a northeastern path. it appeared to be at least a couple of thousand feet up, maybe higher. after another thirty seconds or so i poked my head inside the store and said to my coworker "hey, do you want to see a ufo?"  my coworker joined me outside as there was no one in the store. we both watched as it traveled overhead. my coworker said "that does not look like any plane i have ever seen."  i agreed. even when the light passed directly overhead there was no engine noise as would be expected from an airplane or helicopter. we observed the phenomenon until it passed out of sight behind some trees to the east of the strip mall complex the store is located in. i have no idea what it was, it definitely not a plane, helicopter, hot-air balloon or a meteor.
content.summary: Orange orb no sound

content.detailedDescription:
On the spur-of-the-moment i decided to take my family to donner lake. we only recently moved to reno from ohio and i thought my wife & son might enjoy a day at the lake. while we were there i took several pictures on my cell phone. 

later that day, while going over the pictures before uploading them to facebook, i came across one that had a picture of "something" that appears to be hovering in the sky above the mountains on the opposite shore from us. 

i didn't notice it when i took the picture only afterwards. i have no idea what it is, but it doesn't appear in any of the pictures i took either before or after this one.
content.summary: Object found in photo after the fact

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking in a northeasterly direction when i noticed a bright white light slowly flying over the treeline and heading in a southeasterly direction between allison and (best guess) foster road.

the "object" itself glowed / emitted a steady bright white light and had no detectable flashing lights. nor did i detect any sound coming from, or in the general direction of the object. the object appeared to be wavering erratically (up and down), much like a stone being skipped across the water.

i watched it for several seconds to confirm what i was seeing wasn't a "conventional" aircraft (i.E. looking for flashing lights, listening for sound, etc). when i came to the conclusion it was not a plane /jet/ helicopter, etc, i yelled to a friend "come quickly, look at this." but, by the time they walked over to my location, the object had disappeared behind some trees and was gone from sight.

as for the relative distance and duration of the sighting: using my fingers / outstretched arm[s] as a reference point, the object was approximately two inches above the treeline and traveled approximately four - five feet. the total duration of the sighting was approximately three minutes.
content.summary: Low flying, bright white light slowly traveling over treeline on a clear night in a secluded area

content.detailedDescription:
There were 10 of us on my back deck. we were watching the fireworks. we saw an orange round object zoom across the sky away from the fireworks. then there was another one and then two close together, then one, they continued to fly across the sky away from the fireworks in a straight line. they got to a certain spot in the sky and disappeared. we are not sure if there was a cloud they went behind as it was dark. when we first saw it we thought it was part of the firework display but as we watched we saw that this was far from the case. there was approximately 15 of these objects following each other. they were not closely following. it would be a minute or so before the next one came. the whole procession took about 15 minutes. the fireworks were over as they orbs continued their path. in fact they went right through two fireworks that were in the sky. they continued their path as if not affected by the lights.

my sister-in-law tried to take a picture but all she got was a blur. when she tried to enlarge it she only got a huge orange blur.
content.summary: Watching fireworks when they started to travel across the sky

content.detailedDescription: My parents, my brother his girlfriend, and i went out on clear lake in our boat to watch the firework show. we had to boat across the northern side of the lake to anchor off about quarter mile off shore from library park in lakeport. at around 9:35pm the firework show started, the beginning of the show was slow so i started to look around the horizon. when i looked towards the right of the fireworks i noticed the green and red object in the sky. at first i thought it was a satellite but i realized it was inside of our atmosphere. i alerted everyone about the object in the sky and we started to take pictures of it with my dad's digital camera. unfortunately at the time the ufo was present there are no stars in the sky to contrast the object. it seemed as if the ufo was observing the fireworks, and it ascended and descended and it made sharp turns in the sky, as if it had anti-gravity abilities. being a very firm believer in extra-terrestrial life whether it being intelligent or not, once i realized it was a ufo i was actually kind of joyed to see it since it's been a while since i've seen one. after about 10 minutes the ufo flew north more and descended behind the mountains.  also i have about 20 more pictures if you want them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw ufo in sky during firework show on fourth of july

content.detailedDescription: Viewing fireworks in ashburn, va night of july 5, 2014.  noticed two distinct ufos hovering due south, apparently over dulles airport, to the right of fireworks display.  first was two vertical lights, top red, bottom green.  second was single red-orange light, which appeared farther away.  can't be certain of heights, sizes, or distances because they appeared at night.  red-orange object was to right of red-green object.  both would hover, then descend and ascend from time to time.  red-green object would occasionally descend below tree line, then ascend to height again.  red-orange object never descended below tree line.  red-green object would move horizontally as well as vertically, in curved vertical paths, but red-orange object ascended, descended, and hovered only.  both objects moved independently of each other.  red-green object eventually descended below tree line, leaving only red-orange object, which remained hovering for about five more minutes, then moved off to south-east in curved path.  suspect red-green object was a drone, but not certain.  do not believe red-orange object was drone or aircraft, because it did not have standard red-green navigational lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two ufos over dulles airport

content.detailedDescription: My parents, my brother his girlfriend, and i went out on clear lake in our boat to watch the firework show. we had to boat across the northern side of the lake to anchor off about quarter mile off shore from library park in lakeport. at around 9:35pm the firework show started, the beginning of the show was slow so i started to look around the horizon. when i looked towards the right of the fireworks i noticed the green and red object in the sky. at first i thought it was a satellite but i realized it was inside of our atmosphere. i alerted everyone about the object in the sky and we started to take pictures of it with my dad's digital camera. unfortunately at the time the ufo was present there are no stars in the sky to contrast the object. it seemed as if the ufo was observing the fireworks, and it ascended and descended and it made sharp turns in the sky, as if it had anti-gravity abilities. being a very firm believer in extra-terrestrial life whether it being intelligent or not, once i realized it was a ufo i was actually kind of joyed to see it since it's been a while since i've seen one. after about 10 minutes the ufo flew north more and descended behind the mountains.  also i have about 20 more pictures if you want them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw ufo in sky during firework show on fourth of july

content.detailedDescription: i took some random pictures of buildings while waiting to view fireworks from unusualy closed fdr drive.Upon viewing photos i noticed object in question.I did not notice the object at the time i took the photo.
content.summary: Random picture taken with phone while waiting for macy's fireworks display from fdr drive. i was between manhattan and brooklyn bridges

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping at stillwater cove.  we were taking the dogs for there last walk before we headed to our tents.  as we were standing and talking and the dogs were doing their business, she said what's that?  i looked up and said i have no idea.  she said it must be mars, i said mars is not located between the earth and the moon.  we kept looking at it and wondered if it was moving or if we were.  so i said, hey i'll get my camera and will do a times exposure to see if it's moving.  still not in any big hurry, thinking it must be a helicopter, i set the camera on my tri-pod and set the camera on auto, and then set the timed shutter release so i could minimize camera shake.  we had a very slight wind which i believe made a slight movement while the camera was taking the shot.  i took a total of four shots, before we looked up and this orb went from one side of the sky to the next.  i knew at that moment i was seeing a real ufo.  my friend become very upset and walked away.  i kept watching and the other red object when it appeared like it dropped and then it took off in the same direction.  i would say it went from the south to the north and was gone in less than 5 seconds.  this all took place above the ocean so we had a very clear view of the horizon.  
i was shocked when i finally looked at the pictures.  my friend took one look and will not look at them or talk about the experience...Kind of strange.  this was one of the greatest things i have ever seen in my life.
content.summary: My friend looked up and asked me what's that?  it was stationary, and she said is that mars, i told her mars is not between the earth and the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
We were parked at the mormon church on bennett rd. facing east, around 9:15 p.M.
it was the 4th of july and we were watching fireworks. i had felt a prompting to go out and follow the sound of fireworks going off. my mother was feeling down so i prompted her to go for a drive with me. 

we went to the church and could see fireworks on the other side of the interstate a few miles off. we parked to watch. we weren't there even five minutes when i noticed an orange ball of lights slowly floating up from the horizon, followed by another. they all floated in the same flight pattern one after another. there were about 5 and they seemed to form the shape of a craft for a brief moment and then floated in line again. 

i thought maybe they were helicopters but we could hear no sound, and there aren't seven helicopters that i know of in the whole city. they traveled through the same air space as the exploding fireworks without moving, or being phased. there was nothing attached to indicate they were lanterns.

after the orange lights disappeared, about 8-10 minutes later, we saw a white orb (like frosted glass) fly over head also traveling north, same as the orange balls.
content.summary: Orange lights and white orb

content.detailedDescription: I saw it and knew it wasn't a normal aircraft so i took a pic and a video. i posted them to my instagram . i also saw an airplane traveling at the same distance about 20 mins later and took a photo and vid posted to my instagram to show the difference between a plane and the ufo.
content.summary: I looked up and saw it moving to the north east

content.detailedDescription: I was in a parking lot about half a mile to the west of the westfield mall in brandon. weather conditions were cloudy with scattered rain showers. fireworks started about 8.40 pm and i was in my car because of a light drizzle. my car was facing east and i first noticed the object to the south and thought it might be a helicopter but as i continued to watch and it got closer it was obvious that it was not a conventional aircraft.I have an aviation background have worked on gov't avionics projects for over 25 years and am familiar with many aircraft not familiar to the general public. the object moved from my south to a position to my west at about 70 degrees elevation and hovered. the object was under the cloud ceiling and no sound could be heard. the object appeared oval with light beams projecting from the circumference of the object and had a hemispherical red lit dome like area on top with short red spikes of light projecting upward.When the object came to a hover and i got a good look at it i knew this probably was not something built here. i had to peek out my of my car window to see the object and i had it in sight about two minutes and last time i peeked out it was gone. the main reason for this report is that i saw a picture of this object published by the chilean government online and it was exactly the same except that their photo was in daylight and the reddish dome area was not visible but the light rays from the circumference are. my gut feeling is that this is a new type of craft.
content.summary: Object observed while watching fireworks at brandon westfield mall

content.detailedDescription: My family and i had driven to a family-owned lake to go fishing until nightfall. i had just stepped out of the car to unload our supplies when i looked at the sky on my left. i saw a white (or grey) disc-like object making a slow path across the sky from right to left between two clouds. it seemed to have a small dome on top. the sun was high in the sky and was causing a bright reflection on the back end of the object leading me to think it was metallic. i pulled out my phone to try to take a picture, but couldn't get the object to show up on camera. when i gave up and tried to observe the object some more, it was gone. it couldn't have gone into the clouds since both clouds were a large distance apart and when i tried to take a picture it was almost perfectly in-between both of them.
content.summary: Went fishing with family and noticed disc-like, reflective object with small dome flying slowly from right to left between two clouds. tried to take picture, but object had disappeared even though clouds were far apart.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to watch the neighborhood fireworks.  as i was watching the fireworks i noticed an object much much higher in the sky than the fireworks. airplanes wear flying by and they were definitely under this object. i stood there for over a half hour watching this object. i am almost positive it was not a star because this object had a white light and what seemed like a red light a bit further than the white light. the object seemed to move to my right and then back again. i couldn't tell for sure but sometimes i could almost make out black "wings" or a black shape around the lights. after watching this object for about 45 minutes i figured without a telescope i wasn't going to gain any further information. today, july 6 th i came over to visit my parents. they live about a mile and a half from me.  we were sitting outside and they were telling me about the fireworks they saw last night. i then said to my mother, " your probably going to think i am crazy but last night i saw something in the sky that wasn't an airplane". she almost jumped out of her chair and said "we all saw it too" they live on a dead end street and all the neighbors gather in my parents driveway to have a beer and tell stories.  but when she said they all saw it i couldn't believe it. they said they also could almost make out a black shape around the lights. they said the lights they saw were red. they all said it also never moved. they saw the object about an hour after i saw it. they said around 10:45-11:00 that the object slowly flew over their house and there was no sound. they said they couldn't believe it and didn't want to tell anyone be ause people would think they were crazy. that's my story.
content.summary: Saw object while watching fireworks

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1. returning to place of residence after traveling to sacramento, ca.
2. i noticed an abnormality in the star formations; noticed movement.
3. star; planet; &/or comet shower.
4. no sound, fast, disappeared, observed &reabsorbed, formed shifting geometric shapes / patterns.
5. no comment...
6. walk inside place of residence to sleep. they were still there when i went inside, gone by morning.
content.summary: Multiple orbs cited over the napa valley.

content.detailedDescription: Driving up the mtn. 441 south from 74e/w junction. driven many times at night thought it was cell tower,but too bright as noticed the fire color. fireball or standing fire ball was not moving at all,,visible for only a few moments and then flickered in a quick diminishing second.
content.summary: Bright light shed on whole side of mountain hovering over just over tree line then vanished,or diminished

content.detailedDescription: My fianc�� and i were returning from store when we pulled up to my house i noticed a very bright orange orb. with the 4th of july just passing i thought it was fireworks at first. when the orb was still hovering and actually moving towards our direction i knew it was not fireworks. it got almost right overhead of us making no noise at all, then abrubtly changed directions and started to dim. after it dimmed you could still see the orb as if it was giving a faint red glow then it disappeared as it got farther away. i shot 24 seconds of video with my iphone, it's not the best video but you can clearly see the orb hovering away.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My fiancé and i notices a large orange silent orb, it changed direction and dimmed. still visible after dimming

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was outside about 1250 am july 6 and my wife saw it first. our 2 friends and myself saw it going directly over head in straight line. it was not round as it looked like yellow orange flames and it was flickering. travelling faster than a plane and looked like itstayed same height until it disappeared. looked like about one mile high. it disappeared in thedistance. itfelt very weird as we have never seen anything like it
it was t a meteor either. mybest guess would bespace junk but it didnt look like it was losing altitude
content.summary: Flickering yellow orange object west to east. not round looked like flames

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work, and as i was talking to another employee outside the establishment. i happened to look up into the sky. (looking back on it, i believe it was by instinct or a feeling that i looked up) then i saw a small white dot about 1+ mile away, well over the treeline, slowly move in a horizontal line, in broad daylight. 

i said, "what is that?" i had to hold my right hand to block the sunlight, and then i saw it slowing down to a near stop (that's when i noticed an orb shape and said to myself that i had to run inside for the company camera) it was there for a few more moments and then it continued on in a southbound trajectory until it simply disappeared.I knew that an airplane couldn't slow down that way, and it didn't look like a helicopter or aircraft, or balloon (pretty typical sights in manhattan) 

as i was observing, a strange looking old lady, who happened to be in the park adjacent to the facility asked me what i was looking at, and i said, "i think it's ufo!" the other employee and another passer-by were all saying,"wow!" and she said, "oh yes, a ufo, they're looking at us..", or "they know we're here". that made me uneasy. i shot 7 quick photos. the most interesting part is that when i went to check them on the computer, it wasn't only the single orb that came up, but several others near and far, basically scattered all over the picture. 

i didn't bother sending it to the news or calling atf at laguardia, even though many people told me to do so. the white speck is in the center/left, moving from left to right. to the immediate left of the main (closest)orb are two more orbs in the background next to it. images 5714 and 5715 are the most compelling to me. i never thought i'd see a ufo sighting period. especially in manhattan, and especially a mass sighting in broad daylight. truly fascinating. i'd really like to see if the image can be rendered more to see the object more clearly as it is a little pixelated as i zoom into the image.Please let me know what you see if you clean up the image, i'm extremely curious. thanks.
content.summary: A fleet of 10+ white orbs in alternating formations moving from northeast manhattan southbound.

content.detailedDescription: We were on the deck talking and watching the fireworks in the neighborhood. we observed a single orange-ish oval or sphere traveling at a constant speed.  we initially noticed it to the west southwest of our house and it was traveling northwest. i thought it might be an airliner on approach to mci but it made no noise at all and it was much lower.  it was glowing orange, not landing lights or point source of light and no red/green wing-tip lights or strobes.  as it progressed to the nw it did not vary in size or intensity. this was observed by 4 adults for approximately 2 minutes.  the time was 11:10pm. the night was clear and calm.
content.summary: Orange-ish oval or sphere traveling nw at a constant speed.

content.detailedDescription: I and my wife in car going west.  open area with corn fields.  seen light coming toward us from sw hight unknown hight with yellow/red light non blinking.  we stopped and let the light travel over head. no sound. we contuined west and could see more objects. we stopped again and now looked to east and the light was the same. total objects seen 5 all going same dirction same line sw to ne
content.summary: 5 objects with non blinking lightes  seen going from sw to ne direction about 5 min apart  1st one we stopped on road and let it travle overhead (no sound) and still brightly lighted

content.detailedDescription: We was celebrating the forth of july with my family in tulsa oklahoma  it was late like around 9:45 pm when my sister in law looks up and says "look at that in the sky what is that!" one of the kids said it's an alien so i grabbed my phone and shot a video the object seemed to hover high in the sky changing directions left to right and had like a orange blinking light it stayed for about 15 min probably longer before we even noticed it. then the blinking light starts to dim and the object is not seen anymore
content.summary: Object hovers from left to right lights blinking for like 15 min then lights dimmed out and object no longer was seen
